pages.text: The Vault Enchanter introduces an $(l)easier$() and $(l)less consuming$() way to $(l)enchant$() $(l:vault_gear/identification)$(t:Vault Gear)Vault Gear$() and $(l:vault_tools/variants)$(t:Vault Tools)Vault Tools$().$(br2)Instead of using an Enchantment Table or Villagers, it introduces a way to $(l)choose$() and $(l)replace$() enchantments from within a $(l)single UI$().$(br2)All enchantments in the Vault Enchanter are the $(l)maximum$() level for that enchantment.

pages.title: Vault Enchanter
pages.text: After inputting Vault Gear or a Vault Tool of choice, an enchantment can be selected for the $(l)cost$() of $(l)5 Emeralds$() and $(l)1 Experience level$().
